about_the_game:
It's time to uncover the Evil and Nasties!



Complete your collection and show off your style!
This pack of ten characters can be used in either single-player or multiplayer modes.

Pack includes:
217. Scar the Zombie
099. Grim the hardened Grim Reaper
119. Wizz the magical Wizard
174. Rash the Devil
081. Gus the fierce Viking
143. Puck the Nightmare
172. Slap the stealthy killer
178. Nudge the Skeleton Knight
179. Viktor the leader of the rival Gang
203. Smiler the crazy psycho

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 780 GTX / AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enhance your gameplay with this Finders Reapers Monsters & Icons character pack. Collect all the characters, complete your collection and take them online.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
